physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: No acute distress (NAD), alert and oriented times three (AOX3). Cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm (RRR). Respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally (CTAB). Abdomen: Incision clear, dry, intact (c/d/i). Bowel sounds positive (BS), soft, non-tender, non-distended (NTND). Extremities: No edema bilaterally.
